wisdom: We are born wise, we are born complete.
Live righteously and love everyone, you will build up around you an aura of light and love.
Without realizing who you are, happiness cannot come to you.
Peace of mind comes piece by piece.
Compassion has no limit. Kindness has no enemy.
Love is to live for somebody, love is not to live with somebody.
Spread the light; be the lighthouse.
If you do anything out of sheer compassion, you will never be wrong.
If we are happy, everybody looks up and shares our happiness.
Use your head to live with heart.
It is not talking of love, but living in love that is everything.
Love yourself so that you may know how to live with self-respect.
Let your heart speak to others' hearts.

traditionalMedicinals.description: Thoughts and inspiration from Traditional Medicinals tea bag labels.

wisdom.quote: If you truly love nature, you will find beauty everywhere.
wisdom.author: Vincent Van Gogh

wisdom.quote: One touch of nature makes the whole world kin.
wisdom.author: William Shakespeare

wisdom.quote: There is pleasure in the pathless woods.
wisdom.author: Lord Byron

wisdom.quote: He who wants a rose must respect the thorn.
wisdom.author: Persian Proverb

wisdom.quote: The garden is a delight to the eye and a solace for the soul.
wisdom.author: Saadi

wisdom.quote: The difference between a flower and a weed is a judgment.
wisdom.author: Unknown

wisdom.quote: From a small seed a mighty trunk may grow.
wisdom.author: Aeschylus
